item.title: events
item.description:
We Will have a flea market table at
Home - NEAR-Fest.comNEAR-Fest is New England's premier hamfest. Located at the Hillsborough County 4H Fairgrounds New Boston, NH. NEAR-Fest is a hamfest held twice annually and has been described as the "Woodstock of ham radio".near-fest.com
Home - WFDAwinterfieldday.org
Winter Field DayJanuary 25, 2025 at 2:00 PM EST - January 26, 2025 at 1:59 PM EST


WMAARS will be doing a demonstration of Morse Code on 9/28/2024 at:
Trolleyfest - Shelburne Falls Trolley MuseumShelburne Falls Trolley Museum centers around a restored 1896 trolley that ran from Shelburne Falls, MA to Colrain city.www.sftm.org
Winter Field DayJanuary 27, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST - January 28, 2024 at 1:59 PM EST
Winter Field Day is held the last full weekend in January. For 2024, it will be held on January 27th and 28th. The 24-hour operational period starts at 1900 UTC on Saturday, the 27th, and ends at 18:59 UTC on Sunday, the 28th. Stations may begin setting up no earlier than 19:00 UTC (2 pm EST) on the Friday before.

This Weekend (October 13  &  14, 2023) WMAARS, will be at near-fest in Deerfield, NH.
Home - NEAR-Fest.comNEAR-Fest is New Englands premier hamfest. Located at the deerfield Fairgrounds in New Hampshire.NEAR-Fest is a hamfest well twice annually in Deerfield, NH at the Deerfield Fairgrounds.It has been described as the "Woodstock of ham radio"near-fest.com

WMAARS was just at:
Leyden Ready Fest, 09/30/2023

More events to be announced soon.
item.dc:creator: Aaron Addison

item.title: Western Massachusetts Amateur Radio Society
item.description:
Greetings,
This radio 'club' is aimed towards:

POTA (Parks on the Air)
Emergency Preparedness
Field Day and Winter Field Day
Teaching the art of ham radio
Getting people licensed
And then getting them on the air!
This is a NO dues, NO assets club. We will not charge dues, and the club will not have a storehouse of gear.
This does not mean members won't help new members. And we may have a repeater at some point - But it will remain the property of the person or people who donate their time and resources to the larger radio community.
We hope to have periodic meet-ups for POTA or other events.
Membership will be open to anyone pending review of the existing membership committee.
If you have questions please email membershipwmaars.com
item.dc:creator: Aaron Addison

item.title: Member Code of Conduct
item.description:
The Western Massachusetts Amateur Radio Society will be a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socioeconomic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, political affiliation or sexual identity and orientation.
Members who fail to meet this standard will be asked to leave.
item.dc:creator: Aaron Addison

item.dc:creator: Aaron Addison

item.title: F.A.Q.
item.description:
Q) I just want to be able to talk to my neighbors, and around my neighborhood easily, what do you recommend?
A) FRS radios, Like Below work great and do not require a licence, fee or a test.
Amazon.com: Midland® - T31VP - X Talker - 22 Channel FRS Walkie Talkies - Extended Range Two-Way Radios, 38 Privacy Codes, & NOAA Weather Alert - Set of 2 - Black/Red : ElectronicsBuy Midland® - T31VP - X Talker - 22 Channel FRS Walkie Talkies - Extended Range Two-Way Radios, 38 Privacy Codes, & NOAA Weather Alert - Set of 2 - Black/Red: Two-Way Radios - Amazon.com ✓ FREE DELIVERY possible on eligible purchaseswww.amazon.com
GRMS radios like the one below, do require you to pay a fee of $35 to the FCC, but they do have more range.
Amazon.com: Midland 50 Channel GMRS Two-Way Radio - Long Range Walkie Talkie with 142 Privacy Codes, SOS Siren, and NOAA Weather Alerts and Weather Scan (Black/Silver, Pair Pack) : ElectronicsAmazon.com: Midland 50 Channel GMRS Two-Way Radio - Long Range Walkie Talkie with 142 Privacy Codes, SOS Siren, and NOAA Weather Alerts and Weather Scan (Black/Silver, Pair Pack) : Electronicswww.amazon.com
Q) I just want to be able to text my family in the event of a power outage.
A) You can use winlink or APRS to do this with a ham radio, but also the Garmin inReach might be worth looking at.
Garmin inReach® Messenger | Satellite CommunicatorinReach Messenger is a satellite communicator to keep you connected when there’s no cellphone coverage, featuring global two-way text messaging and SOS alerts.www.garmin.com
